meta.scope: Pancreatic cancer integrative/TCM evidence library (educational, not medical order).

title.zh: 中医辨证分型（示例：四型）

summary.zh: 部分资料将胰腺癌相关证候分为多种类型，用于指导治法与方药选择。
summary.en: Some sources describe multiple TCM patterns to guide treatment principles and formulas.

formula.zh: 大柴胡汤合血府逐瘀汤加减
formula.en: Da Chai Hu Tang + Xue Fu Zhu Yu Tang (modified)

notes.zh: 症状描述见来源；需注册中医师辨证。
notes.en: Symptoms are source-described; requires qualified TCM clinician.

safety.zh: 仅用于健康教育；不替代个体化诊疗。
safety.en: Educational only; not a substitute for individualized care.

title.zh: 肝胆湿热证（胰头癌伴黄疸）

summary.zh: 资料提到胰头癌伴黄疸、舌红苔黄腻等，可辨为肝胆湿热证，治以清肝利胆、祛湿降浊，方药茵陈蒿汤加减。
summary.en: Source describes jaundice presentation mapped to damp-heat; Yin Chen Hao Tang modifications suggested.

key_points.zh: 方药：茵陈蒿汤加减；药物包括茵陈、大黄、栀子等。
key_points.en: Formula: Yin Chen Hao Tang modified; herbs include Yin Chen, Da Huang, Zhi Zi.

safety.zh: 含大黄等泻下药，腹泻/肠梗阻风险者需谨慎并遵医嘱。
safety.en: Contains purgative herbs (e.g., Da Huang); caution with diarrhea/obstruction risks; clinician supervision needed.

title.zh: 中晚期常见：脾虚湿阻 / 肝阴亏虚
title.en: Common mid–late patterns: spleen deficiency with dampness / liver yin deficiency

summary.zh: 资料提到中晚期可见脾虚湿阻及肝阴亏虚证，分别可用陈夏六君汤加减与一贯煎合二至丸加减，并列出常用药材。
summary.en: Source notes these patterns and suggests Chenxia Liu Jun Tang or Yiguan Jian + Erzhi Wan modifications with example herbs.

key_points.zh: 脾虚湿阻：党参、白术、茯苓、法半夏等组成陈夏六君汤加减。
key_points.en: Spleen deficiency dampness: Chenxia Liu Jun Tang (e.g., Dang Shen, Bai Zhu, Fu Ling, Fa Ban Xia).

key_points.zh: 肝阴亏虚：一贯煎合二至丸加减；如沙参、麦冬、地黄、枸杞子、女贞子等。
key_points.en: Liver yin deficiency: Yiguan Jian + Erzhi Wan (e.g., Sha Shen, Mai Dong, Di Huang, Gou Qi Zi, Nv Zhen Zi).

key_points.zh: 常加用：半枝莲、蛇六谷、山慈菇、莪术等以清热解毒、活血消癥。
key_points.en: Often mentioned additions: Ban Zhi Lian, She Liu Gu, Shan Ci Gu, E Zhu, etc.

safety.zh: 化疗期间如需中药，应关注相互作用；可考虑以针灸等方式减轻不适，避免中药与化疗冲突。
safety.en: During chemotherapy, consider interaction risk; source suggests acupuncture for symptom relief to avoid herb–chemo conflict.

title.zh: 中药联合化疗/放疗：部分研究观察结果
title.en: Herbal medicine combined with chemo/radiotherapy: selected observational findings

summary.zh: 一篇综述/文献汇总提到，部分研究报道中药方联合化疗或放疗在疾病控制率/有效率、KPS等方面优于单纯治疗（具体方药与研究设计需逐条核对原文）。
summary.en: A review-style source reports some studies where herbal formulas plus chemo/radiotherapy showed higher response/control rates and better KPS; details require checking each original study.

examples.zh: 茵陈蒿汤（含茵陈、栀子、大黄等）联合替吉奥：报道疾病控制率较单纯化疗提高。
examples.en: Yin Chen Hao Tang + S-1 (tegafur/gimeracil/oteracil): reported higher disease control rate.

examples.zh: 自拟复方柴胡溃坚汤联合化疗：报道有效率更高且KPS更好。
examples.en: Chaihu Kuijian Tang + chemo: reported higher response rate and improved KPS.

safety.zh: 证据质量可能不一；需强调“与主治团队沟通、避免延误标准治疗”。
safety.en: Evidence quality varies; emphasize coordination with oncology team and not delaying standard care.

title.zh: 中西医协作与风险管理（实践建议）

summary.zh: 来源提到在患者担忧化疗副作用时，可在化疗前以中药增体质，化疗期间优先用针灸等减少不适以避免“中药与化疗冲突”，化疗后再中药调理。
summary.en: Source suggests: use herbs pre-chemo for conditioning; prefer acupuncture during chemo to reduce side effects and avoid herb–chemo conflicts; resume herbs post-chemo.

safety.zh: 任何中药/补充剂应记录并与肿瘤科/药师核对潜在相互作用。
safety.en: Record all herbs/supplements; cross-check interactions with oncology/pharmacy.

title.en: How to use integrative/TCM info safely
title.zh: 如何安全使用中医/整合医学信息

summary.en: Use TCM/integrative approaches as supportive care, not a replacement for standard oncology treatment.
summary.zh: 中医/整合医学建议仅作为支持治疗信息，不可替代标准肿瘤治疗。

key_points.en: Tell your oncology team about any herb/supplement you plan to use.
key_points.zh: 任何中药/补充剂务必告知肿瘤团队。

key_points.en: Check bleeding risk (anticoagulants, low platelets, surgery).
key_points.zh: 重点评估出血风险（抗凝、血小板低、手术前后）。

key_points.en: Check liver/kidney function and potential CYP interactions.
key_points.zh: 关注肝肾功能与药物代谢相互作用（如 CYP）。

key_points.en: Prefer licensed practitioners and products with quality control.
key_points.zh: 优先选择合规执业者与质量可追溯产品。

safety.en: Educational only; not medical advice.
safety.zh: 仅供健康教育，不构成医疗建议。

summary.en: moderate evidence exists for some non-drug options (e.g., ginger, acupuncture) in supportive care.
summary.zh: 支持治疗中部分非药物方法（如姜、针灸）有一定证据。

key_points.en: Track triggers (fat, spice, portion size).
key_points.zh: 记录诱因（高脂、辛辣、进食量）。

key_points.en: Escalate to clinician if persistent, severe, or with red flags.
key_points.zh: 若持续/严重或出现警讯需就医。

safety.en: Seek urgent care for dehydration, fever, blood in stool, or worsening jaundice.
safety.zh: 出现脱水、发热、便血或黄疸加重等需及时就医。

summary.en: Prioritize hydration, low-fat meals; discuss pancreatic enzymes and infections with clinician.
summary.zh: 优先补液、低脂饮食；与医生讨论胰酶与感染等原因。

title.en: Questions to ask your clinician about supplements

summary.zh: 用这些问题降低使用补充剂/中药的风险。
